# Pies - All pies require a [color=#a4885c]pie tin[/color] along with the other ingredients in the microwave! The tin is retrieved when the pie is eaten, [color=#fcdf03]but when the pie is thrown, the tin is lost[/color]. - All pies are made with [color=#a4885c]pie dough[/color].
[color=#a4885c]Pie Dough[/color]
- 15u flour - 2 eggs - 5u salt
[color=#a4885c]Apple Pie[/color]
- pie dough - 3x apple
- Analogically, other pies are made by using three pieces of a different ingredient [color=#888084](examine to learn more about them)[/color]!
[color=#a4885c]Amanita Pie[/color]
- pie dough - 1 Fly Amanita
